snippet: AMC Entertainment, which owns the second-largest movie theater chain in North America, is in talks to sell the company or a significant stake in it to the Wanda Group, one of China's largest theater owners, Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes report in...
abstract: AMC Entertainment, which owns the second-largest movie theater chain in North America, is in talks to sell the company or a significant stake in it to the Wanda Group, one of China's largest theater owners, Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes report in The New York Times.

headline.main: AMC Said to Be Talking to Chinese Buyer
